name: Pixel Shopkeeper
description: Be a Pixel Shopkeeper! Collect items using inventory management puzzle mechanics. Sell your wares, decorate your shop, craft new products, and expand! Train to beat tougher dungeons, unlock new classes and decor, and furnish your shop smartly to maximize profits!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: 2.0 GHz or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 450 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
recommended_requirements: Memory: 1 GB RAM Storage: 500 MB available space
